      public SystemResponseWrapper retrieveSystemByDatabaseID(String databaseID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to retrieve an existing System using its databaseID as unique identifier.
      Specified by:
      retrieveSystemByDatabaseID in interface SystemPersistenceLayerDaos
      Parameters:
      databaseID - A UUID that uniquely identifies an existing System in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the retrieved System or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if requestDto is null.

    • updateSystem

      public SystemResponseWrapper updateSystem(SystemRequestDto requestDto, String databaseID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to update an existing System using its databaseID as unique identifier.
      Specified by:
      updateSystem in interface SystemPersistenceLayerDaos
      Parameters:
      requestDto - A data transfer object with values for the attributes of the System, not null.
      databaseID - A UUID that uniquely identifies an existing System in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the updated System or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if requestDto is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - - if databaseID is null or empty string.
